nodes.text: During the Clone Wars, Senator Padmé Amidala received as message from one of her handmaidens, Duja. Duja reported that Separatists were on Mokivj and had a droid factory in place. Padme would go on to investigate, but her husband, Jedi Knight Anakin Skywalker would go in to find out what went wrong. Anakin would later meet a mysterious ship underneath the command of Chiss Senior Captain Mitth'raw'nuruodo, also known by his core name of "Thrawn." When Thrawn met Skywalker, he introduced himself as a commander instead of a Senior Captain. His pilot, the Sky-walker Che'ri, reasoned that using the lower rank was less intimidating.
